rev.desc.rev.desc: blank line(double separator) is not effective for the previous line of last line in setting description(action field) of probsummary by eventin
label: map.fields.2c
first line:
$tlng=lng(denull($temp2))+1
replaed as
$tlng=lng($temp2)+1
25301 Error when processing cm3rin eventin record when an array of structures is the last field in the cm3r dbdict.
panel: set.struc.types.2
replace the statement
if (2 in $L.st in field in $L.tmp.dbdict=1 and 3 in $L.st in field in $L.tmp.dbdict=$L.tmp.index+1) then ($L.c=false)
with
if (null($L.st in field in $L.tmp.dbdict) or (2 in $L.st in field in $L.tmp.dbdict=1 and 3 in $L.st in field in $L.tmp.dbdict=$L.tmp.index+1)) then ($L.c=false)
Re-bound the normal exit on the exit.no.map panel.
Modified map.fields.1 to account for the array data type field being null.

Changes made to allow for the mapping of arrays of structures. High-level algorithm: get the data types for the subelements of the array of structure being mapped, then within the existing loop panel for arrays (map.fields.2d), add processing to take care of the subelements of the structure. MODIFIED panels: map.fields.2d. NEW panels: get.joindef, build.joindef.qry, select.joindef, set.evfile.nojoindef, init.primary, build.primary.qry, select.primary, check.primary, decide.check.attr, init.attr, build.attr.qry, select.attr, check.attr, decide.continue, init.dbdict, build.dbdict.qry, select.dbdict, set.struc.types, set.struc.types.1, set.struc.types.2
Change was made to change
$L.counter>lng($denull(FIELD.LIST) )
to $
L.counter>lng($FIELD.LIST)
Changes made in panel map.fields.2c - 2nd strtrmr should be strtrml to trim leading blanks. Also, the first argument of the val() function should be $temp1
Increment $L.counter only if there is a value in the field list to be copied from; thus, moved $L.counter+=1 from map.fields to map.fields.2c & map.fields.2
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
Same as below, fixed another panel.
Now maps arrays of numbers/booleans/dates correctly.

descript.descript: blank line(double separator) is not effective for the previous line of last line in setting description(action field) of probsummary by eventin
label: map.fields.2c
first line:
$tlng=lng(denull($temp2))+1
replaed as
$tlng=lng($temp2)+1
25301 Error when processing cm3rin eventin record when an array of structures is the last field in the cm3r dbdict.
panel: set.struc.types.2
replace the statement
if (2 in $L.st in field in $L.tmp.dbdict=1 and 3 in $L.st in field in $L.tmp.dbdict=$L.tmp.index+1) then ($L.c=false)
with
if (null($L.st in field in $L.tmp.dbdict) or (2 in $L.st in field in $L.tmp.dbdict=1 and 3 in $L.st in field in $L.tmp.dbdict=$L.tmp.index+1)) then ($L.c=false)
Re-bound the normal exit on the exit.no.map panel.
Modified map.fields.1 to account for the array data type field being null.

Changes made to allow for the mapping of arrays of structures. MODIFIED panels include: map.fields.1. NEW panels include get.struc.types, build.dbdict.qry, select.dbdict, set.struc.types, set.struc.types.1, set.struc.types.2, map.fields.2e.
Change was made to change
$L.counter>lng($denull(FIELD.LIST) )
to $
L.counter>lng($FIELD.LIST)
Changes made in panel map.fields.2c - 2nd strtrmr should be strtrml to trim leading blanks. Also, the first argument of the val() function should be $temp1
Increment $L.counter only if there is a value in the field list to be copied from; thus, moved $L.counter+=1 from map.fields to map.fields.2c & map.fields.2
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
Same as below, fixed another panel.
Now maps arrays of numbers/booleans/dates correctly.
